verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a marriage <S%G1062><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>:
and <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was bidden <S%G2564><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> the marriage <S%G1062><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when the wine <S%G3631><s%> failed <S%G5302><s%>, the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, They have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>.

His <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the servants <S%G1249><s%>, Whatsoever5100, Leviticus2 he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, do it <S%G4160><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> waterpots <S%G5201><s%> of stone <S%G3035><s%> set <S%G2749><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> after the Jews <S%G2453><s%>' manner of <S%G2596><s%> purifying <S%G2512><s%>, containing <S%G5562><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> firkins <S%G3355><s%> apiece <S%G303><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Fill <S%G1072><s%> the waterpots <S%G5201><s%> with water <S%G5204><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> they filled <S%G1072><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up to <S%G2193><s%> the brim <S%G507><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Draw out <S%G501><s%> now <S%G3568><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bear <S%G5342><s%> unto the ruler of the feast <S%G755><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> they bare it <S%G5342><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the ruler of the feast <S%G755><s%> tasted <S%G1089><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> now become <S%G1096><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> (but <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1249><s%> that had drawn <S%G501><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%>), the ruler of the feast <S%G755><s%> calleth <S%G5455><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> setteth <S%G5087><s%> on first <S%G4412><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> men have drunk <S%G3184><s%> freely <S%G5119><s%>, then that which is worse <S%G1640><s%>: thou <S%G4771><s%> hast kept <S%G5083><s%> the <S%G3631><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of his signs <S%G4592><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> manifested <S%G5319><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> he went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%>, he <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> they abode <S%G3306><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> at hand <S%G1451><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> those that sold <S%G4453><s%> oxen <S%G1016><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doves <S%G4058><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the changers of money <S%G2773><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> a scourge <S%G5416><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> cords <S%G4979><s%>, and cast <S%G1544><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the temple <S%G2411><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> the oxen <S%G1016><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he poured out <S%G1632><s%> the changers <S%G2855><s%>' money <S%G2772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G390><s%> their tables <S%G5132><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> to them that sold <S%G4453><s%> the doves <S%G4058><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, Take <S%G142><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> hence <S%G1782><s%>; make <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>'s house <S%G3624><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of merchandise <S%G1712><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> written <S%G1125><s%>, Zeal <S%G2205><s%> for <S%G3624><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall eat <S%G2719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> up <S%G2719><s%>.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> showest thou <S%G1166><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>, seeing that <S%G3754><s%> thou doest <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Destroy <S%G3089><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> I will raise <S%G1453><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1453><s%>.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Forty <S%G5062><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> was <S%G3618><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> in building <S%G3618><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wilt <S%G1453><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> raise <S%G1453><s%> it up <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>?
But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> spake <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of <S%G4983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>.

When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he was raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he spake <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had said <S%G2036><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>, during <S%G1722><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%>, many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, beholding <S%G2334><s%> his signs <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> did <S%G4160><s%>.

But1161, 846 Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> trust <S%G4100><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, for that <S%G1223><s%> he <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> all men <S%G3956><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he needed <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> one should bear witness <S%G3140><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> man <S%G444><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> himself knew <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> man <S%G444><s%>.
